body:
Funny thing is.
A lot of people seem to think this artist is a He, but in reality, Sasamori Tomoe is actually a woman.

this guy is really exhausting his own creativity, an ero with so many changes in gestures, language provocation, and of course my favourite body proportion, it could have been released with multiple works just by using contents in this one work. highly intensified in  many senses. but of course, u can see the author has great personal passion inside like he has been using women with similar body type all the time, without compromise to draw the welcomed slim/petite type. although i highly doubt such quality can keep for another few years since it's based on passion n bias.
@vandes I am here to help you: https://hentai2read.com/succubus_stayed_life/8/1/

SUDENLY I BELIVE IN GOD...
OH MY FUCKING GOD!!!!
And chap 8 is still not translated...
